entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 1:30 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

Temperature: -8.2°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -13.8°C
